HEADING: Widgets
DESCRIPTION_1: Here you'll find our list of available widgets. You'll find they're all fast and easy to setup and customize. The styling you'll start with is is designed to be built upon to make FastComments match your site. We can help with this - just reach out to Support.
DESCRIPTION_2: In addition, all of our widgets are designed to work with SSO to provide a seamless experience for your users.
DESCRIPTION_3: These widgets are also SEO friendly! Modern search engines execute JavaScript - we've ensured they see the widgets and content just like your users.
WIDGET_LIVE_COMMENTING_DESCRIPTION: Customizable, live commenting for any page or app.
WIDGET_STREAMING_CHAT_DESCRIPTION: Streaming Chat for any Page or App.
WIDGET_COMMENT_COUNT_DESCRIPTION: This widget will add a comment count to any page.
WIDGET_COMMENT_COUNT_BULK_DESCRIPTION: This widget will add a comment count to any page. Used when displaying counts of many items in a list.
WIDGET_RECENT_COMMENTS_DESCRIPTION: This widget will add a list of recent comments to any page.
WIDGET_TOP_PAGES_DESCRIPTION: This widget will add a list of top pages, by comment count, to any page.
